Content.Text:
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, are you <MYNAME>, by any chance? I heard
you moved here just recently.
<PAGE>
Hee hee. You're cute! And you seem really
perky, too. I think I'm going to like you! My
name is <BLUE>Iris</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Have you met my younger brother, Mistel? I
hope the two of us will become good friends
with you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good morning. You're quite the morning
person, aren't you? I'm a night owl, myself, so
I'm actually kind of jealous!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did you sleep well
last night? You may be young, but still, you
shouldn't stay up late too often! It's bad for you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You sure seem to be hard at
work on your farm every day! Do take proper
care of yourself so you don't get sick, though.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello. What's up? Did you need something?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Ah! Oh...sorry, I didn't mean to shout. It's just
that I came up with the perfect idea for a story.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee! I'm going to write it down and show it
to my agent, and I just know it's going to be a
hit!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Have you finished
your work for the day? You must be tired. Rest
well! You've earned it!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Phew. Can't believe it's this late. I should go get
some beauty rest...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good evening! I'm...probably not the person
to tell you this, but you really shouldn't be out
and about this late at night.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You have to wake up early tomorrow, don't you?
So go home and sleep, before I get angry! You
wouldn't like me when I'm angry. Hee hee!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Let's both do our
best today.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Always good to see
you in the morning. ...Do you feel the same
way?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...<MYNAME>, you didn't get enough sleep?
Don't push yourself too hard.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello there. Another busy day, hmm?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Still, busy as you are, I'm glad you take the
time to see me.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello. Hee hee, you know, talking to you is
always really inspiring. I'm going to give it my all
today.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You look pretty busy today. ...Hmm? It cheers
you up to see me? Come on, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. I was getting a little worried;
haven't seen you all day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But you look good. I'm glad. Hey, are you on the
way home? If you have a little time, can we talk
more?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Evening. Well, how about that? It's already dark
out. ...You wanna come round for dinner?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee hee, I was just kidding. You know I like
having you over, but you have work tomorrow,
don't you?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening. Fancy meeting you here. It adds
some flavor to my night!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. Hey, <MYNAME>, what time are
you coming home?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you can get home early, we should kick back
and have a nice chat. It's okay to do that every
once in a while, don't you think?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Hee hee, you look
still sleepy. How about a nice wakeup kiss?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. How're you feeling? Hee hee,
you look good.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You looked really busy this morning. You were
working all over the place without even talking
to me.
<PAGE>
So I held off on talking to you. But I'm glad your
work is coming along.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish I could help with your work, but I'm just
not built for breaking rocks or digging holes...
<PAGE>
I'm sorry I can't help you that way. But I'll do all
the housework I can.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee, you've still got your bedhead from this
morning. Hold still. ...Okay, it's fixed now.
<PAGE>
I didn't tell you earlier because you left me alone
all day. Serves you right.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>, it's night already. I know
you're busy, but you can't even take a minute to
say hi?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You worked hard today, huh? What are you
going to do first tonight? Take a bath, or have
dinner?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...I've been looking forward to spending time
with you all day, <MYNAME>. Let's have a 
nice, relaxing evening together.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You finished your work today? Great! Take a
rest, and leave the housework to me.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, this is what I call spring weather! It's so
warm and comfortable outside...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Some writers listen to music when they're trying
to focus, but I like to listen to rain. That's why I
love rainy days.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's really hot today, isn't it? I might get burned if
I spend too much time outside...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I think this rain's cooling everything off. Nice,
huh?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The sky in the autumn is really beautiful, isn't it?
Just looking up and taking it in... It's inspiring
on so many levels.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Rainy days in the autumn get so overcast. Kinda
depressing, isn't it?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Another cold day... I can deal with it when the
sun's out, but I can't stand the cold at night.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look at all the snow. It's cold, it's ridiculously
cold, but the way it falls is just so beautiful.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You came out in this weather? That's way too
dangerous. Soon as the wind calms down, you
march yourself right back home.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So much snow... I can't go out on a day like
this. How'd you even get all the way here,
anyway?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, there's no way you're working outside in
this weather, huh? What do you say we just
spend the day indoors together?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, you're going out in all this snow? I know
you worry about the farm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But I worry about you. If you go out, please be
careful.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I hear you're seeing someone.
Congrats!
<PAGE>
You mind telling me your love story sometime?
I'm sure it'd make a great book.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It takes skilled hands to make good-quality food,
but the taste of it... I like to think that comes
from the heart.
<PAGE>
This restaurant, for example. The food here
doesn't just fill your belly. The chef makes every
meal an experience.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think you need two things to keep a restaurant
going: good food and a good atmosphere.
<PAGE>
This place gets that. It's clean, it's got some nice
music... It's simple, but it's very "balanced" here.
Know what I mean?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Klaus and I like to get together and talk about
each other's work.
<PAGE>
We're close in age, so it's fun talking to
him...but just FYI, we're not together or
anything.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aren't the sisters here both ridiculously cute?!
<PAGE>
And they both took to me so quickly... It's like I
suddenly have younger sisters of my very own
now! Brings tears of joy to my eyes...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, welcome! Did you come to shop? Or are
you here to speak with one of us?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What am I doing? I'm writing a novel.
And the deadline is fast approaching, so I really
need to get those creative juices flowing!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air around here is so nice and fresh!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air around here is so nice and fresh!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air around here is so nice and fresh!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air around here is so nice and fresh!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air around here is so nice and fresh!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air around here is so nice and fresh!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew! I'm a bit out of breath after all that
walking!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew! That was a bit of a trek.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... I wonder whose land this is?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you like this town? ...I'd say I do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If I didn't, I can't imagine I'd be putting as much
effort into living here as I am!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've seen all the empty lots in town, right? I
keep thinking someone new might be moving
here soon...
<PAGE>
The guild is managing all those properties, so I
have a sneaking suspicion Veronica is planning
something...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heard any good stories lately? I'm looking for
inspiration for my next novel.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's so cute to see young ladies just coming into
their own, isn't it? I love helping them dress up.
<PAGE>
The other day, I got Lillie all coordinated with
clothes and accessories I made.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Time flies when I'm reading a book, or writing
one.
<PAGE>
Sometimes I get so focused on my writing that I
end up skipping meals. That's probably not a
good thing, is it?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mistel's family, and he's precious to me.
<PAGE>
No matter where we end up in life, married or off
in the world or whatever, we'll always be close.
That's what family's all about.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know just enough to be aware of how much I
don't know. That's why I want to learn
everything.
<PAGE>
See, I don't like ignorance. I think it's bad for
you. It narrows your choices in life. Hee hee,
listen to me, getting all philosophical...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You want to know what I was like before
we met?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Hee hee, ladies like me always keep a few
secrets locked away. It's part of our allure, you
see. But...maybe I'll tell you later.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, I always enjoy talking to you.
<PAGE>
Even though we have such different opinions...
Well, maybe that's what makes it fun.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I think maybe we ought to spend some time
apart and think about our relationship... Um,
never mind.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Do you...love me? I don't
know what you think about me these days. It's
kind of nerve-racking.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, when we first met, I couldn't have
imagined we'd be dating like this. I'm so happy
to be your girlfriend.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, it's surprising more people haven't
commented on our age difference. Seems like
we were all worried about that for nothing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Still, sometimes it feels like everything's going
TOO smoothly. I keep waiting for the other shoe
to drop...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since we started dating, all I've been writing are
love stories, and they always end happily ever
after.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>My agent's happy about all my new fans, but it's
still kind of awkward sometimes. I mean...it
feels like I'm writing about us.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you quit making those "robbing the
cradle" jokes? You're not THAT much younger
than I am.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>And you're pretty mature for your age.
Surprisingly so, sometimes.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>I love you, <MYNAME>. ...Hee hee, you're
turning red. You're so innocent. I love that about
you too, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Heh, look at the two of us. All lovey-dovey like
some corny soap opera. Isn't it great?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Pardon me; I didn't see you
over there.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You've gotten a lot...colder lately. What
happened to you...?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...we need to talk. Our relationship's
in trouble, and we need to do something about
it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Back when I was single, I'd eat and sleep
whenever I felt like it...
<PAGE>
Now that we're married, I'm on a regular routine
with you...but I don't mind that at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It's a wonderful feeling, wanting to spend all this
time with somebody I really love.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If there's anything I can help you with, please let
me know. I'm your wife, and I want to be there
for you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We've got the rest of our lives ahead of us. You
and me, together. Nothing makes me happier
than that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hey, I love you, <MYNAME>. Thank you so
much for being my husband.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's funny; long before I met you, I took the idea
of raising a loving family and put it aside.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Even after we got married, it took a little while
for the idea to sink back in again. But here we
are. 
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'm so happy, <MYNAME>, and I have you to
thank for all of it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Hee hee, you don't have to be so nervous.
It's not as if I'm going to bite your head off or
anything.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We had a lot of fun together, didn't we? Thanks
for all the memories.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I never thought we'd reconnect like this. I feel
like I'm in a dream...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
We're really getting married soon, aren't we? For
some reason, it still doesn't quite seem real.
Maybe after the ceremony, it'll sink in.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You were so handsome at the wedding.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm sure you noticed me checking you out all
those times...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So I'm going to be a mother... It's wonderful,
and it's terrifying. We need to learn all about
raising a child. Let's hit the books together.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What do you want to call our baby? We should
pick out the perfect name.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our baby's almost here. I wonder what kind of
baby we're in for, hmm? It's so exciting...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Looking at our kids takes me back to when
Mistel was born. Talk about a nostalgia trip...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are both thriving,
and they get along so well. It's the best any
parent could ask for.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What I'm looking forward to the most is seeing
how they grow up. You too, huh?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Wow, this is my favorite! Thanks for being so
thoughtful.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Are you sure you want to give me something
this nice? Hee hee, this is great! I owe you one.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, did you prepare this just for me? I love it!
Thanks so much!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, can I have this? Thank you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is this for me? I see. Thanks.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Is this for me? ...I'll take it, then.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>You're dead set on giving this to me, aren't
you...? N-no, it's nothing. I'll... I'll take it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I didn't know they had crops this shiny! This is
so sweet. Thank you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look how pretty it is! It's all gold... Can I
really have it? Thank you.
Let's not give her a present right now.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, no, I can't accept this. I think you should
keep it. I appreciate the thought, though...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...You know, it's not like I'm dating you just
because you give me presents or anything. Go
ahead and put that away, would you?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
It's been a while since we actually talked. You
think maybe we should start talking again before
you walk up and give me that?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, no, you just gave me something else. I
couldn't accept this much from you all at once.
Thank you for the thought, though.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you mind if I accept that from you
tomorrow?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>See, that way I know I'll get to talk to you
tomorrow too, and I'll still get both presents.
Good deal, right?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You don't have to give me so many presents all
at once. I'd still love you even without them. So
please save it for next time.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Oh! Is that for my birthday? That's so thoughtful
of you! Thank you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this a birthday present for me? Oh, wow, I
really like it. Thank you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You put together just what I like for my birthday,
huh? Thank you. I'm flattered.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You didn't have to bother with a birthday
present for me... But I appreciate your kindness.
Thank you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? Erm, seriously....? I see. Th-
thank you...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...You know, I have to ask why you picked THIS
for my birthday present. You're not TRYING to
annoy me or anything, are you?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Wow, that's unique. You're the only person
who thought to give me that today. So, um...
Never mind.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I love that gold shine. It's so beautiful!
Hmm? Is this a birthday present for me? Thank
you very much!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This looks so beautiful and precious. Can I really
have it? Thank you for the sweet birthday
present.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you caught a rabbit? I hope you'll let it go
soon.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an adorable animal. But I wouldn't try to
take it home if I were you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An ermine. You know, I've forgotten what they
eat. I read somewhere that they eat...eggs, was
it?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's really cute. Where'd you find it?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Penguins are technically in the bird family,
right? I guess you can tell by their beaks.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just to let you know, Mistel HATES monkeys.
So please don't bring that anywhere near him.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Parrots have very beautiful feathers. They're so
vivid you can spot them from a distance.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You like animals, right? I can tell from the way
you hold them.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Clothes made from Angora rabbits' fur feel so
good, don't they? I have some Angora outfits
myself.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Chicks grow really fast, don't they? I guess it's
tough to look after them as a farmer.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always thought chickens flew around making a
big racket, but they actually seem well-behaved.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it true that dogs are smarter than cats?
<PAGE>
Maybe it is; I've never seen cats "shake hands"
the way dogs do.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, is this dog okay? It seems kind of...chunky.
Shouldn't you make it exercise more...?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a good boy you are!
<PAGE>
I'm not too good at farm work, so please help
<MYNAME> for me, okay?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm kind of surprised to see a dog run around so
much with all those extra pounds weighing it
down. Must be tough...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Cats always look so content when you stroke
them right there on the neck, don't they? So
cute.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee, look at this cat's big, fluffy tummy!
Pat-pat-pat!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you think cats know they're cute?
<PAGE>
I do, and I think that's part of their cuteness.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This cat looks a little...off somehow. I thought it
might be the fur, but no, I think it's just too fat.
<PAGE>
You should make it exercise. When animals get
fat, they get sick easily.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, this is a present for the Flower Fair, right?
Hee hee, thank you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A present for the Flower Fair... Is this for me?
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I appreciate it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a present for the Flower Fair, right? Thank
you. Let's put it on display. We have a vase
somewhere, don't we?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, this must be for White Day, huh? Thank
you. I'll take it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee, thank you. A White Day present from
you means a lot to me.
<PAGE>
Look forward to Valentine's Day. I'll make you a
snack to show my gratitude.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Is this a White Day present? I'm glad days like
this still matter to you even after we're married.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'll enjoy every bite.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, you know what that blue feather's for,
right?
<PAGE>
So don't just show it around like it's nothing.
Save it for that one special moment.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Okay, let's not rush into anything. We've really
got to think these things over first, right? Let's
just...take it slow for now.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...! You're really asking me to marry you? And
you're sure. You've thought it all the way
through.
<PAGE>
...Well, let's go somewhere quiet and talk about
it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't worry. I'm not going to get cold feet or
anything. You can trust me on that.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Are you trying to make fun of how nervous I was
when you proposed to me? ...You're so mean.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, can I talk to you a minute? I hear
you've been showing our blue feather around.
<PAGE>
If it's true, please don't do that anymore. People
might get confused.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a beautiful ring. Who are you going to
give it to?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You're asking me out... Wait, what?! What are
you saying, all of a sudden...? H-hold on. Let's
calm down!
<PAGE>
Okay, let's go somewhere first... Then we can
talk. Follow me.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
This is the proof that we're dating. So we should
take good care of it.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is that the ring from back when we started
dating...? You still have it? That's really sweet.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, can I talk to you a minute? I hear
